explanation: [0-0] A man with curly hair, wearing a black T-shirt, is holding an ice cream cone in his right hand. He is sitting at a white table with a white sheet of paper and a transparent sphere on it.

[0-4] The man opens his mouth and moves the ice cream cone towards it. However, he is holding the cone upside down, with a red circle surrounding the ice cream, preventing the cream from falling. He then raises his left hand and gestures with his index finger, switching the ice cream between his hands back and forth. Next, he picks up the white paper from the table, which reads "FAKE," and shows it with the ice cream.
